mapper.select: SELECT mu.number_id, mu.landing_account, mu.landing_password, mu.networ_kname, mu.account_type, mu.phone, mei.to_examine FROM mc_user mu LEFT JOIN mc_entry_information mei ON mu.number_id = mei.mc_number_id WHERE phone = #{phone}
